name: v-create
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user
hurls itself at its target. It lowers the
user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
